001package org.jfree.chart.legend;
002
003
004import java.awt.Paint;
005import java.awt.Stroke;
006import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
007import org.jfree.chart.event.TitleChangeEvent;
008import java.io.Serializable;
009import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
010
011public class PaintScaleLegendProduct2 implements Serializable, PublicCloneable {
012        private transient Paint stripOutlinePaint;
013        private transient Stroke stripOutlineStroke;
014        private transient Paint backgroundPaint;
015
016        public Paint getStripOutlinePaint() {
017                return stripOutlinePaint;
018        }
019
020        public void setStripOutlinePaint2(Paint stripOutlinePaint) {
021                this.stripOutlinePaint = stripOutlinePaint;
022        }
023
024        public Stroke getStripOutlineStroke() {
025                return stripOutlineStroke;
026        }
027
028        public void setStripOutlineStroke2(Stroke stripOutlineStroke) {
029                this.stripOutlineStroke = stripOutlineStroke;
030        }
031
032        public Paint getBackgroundPaint() {
033                return backgroundPaint;
034        }
035
036        public void setBackgroundPaint2(Paint backgroundPaint) {
037                this.backgroundPaint = backgroundPaint;
038        }
039
040        /**
041        * Sets the paint used to draw the outline of the paint strip, and sends a  {@link TitleChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
042        * @param paint   the paint ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
043        * @see #getStripOutlinePaint()
044        */
045        public void setStripOutlinePaint(Paint paint, PaintScaleLegend paintScaleLegend) {
046                Args.nullNotPermitted(paint, "paint");
047                this.stripOutlinePaint = paint;
048                paintScaleLegend.notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(paintScaleLegend));
049        }
050
051        /**
052        * Sets the stroke used to draw the outline around the paint strip and sends a  {@link TitleChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
053        * @param stroke   the stroke ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
054        * @see #getStripOutlineStroke()
055        */
056        public void setStripOutlineStroke(Stroke stroke, PaintScaleLegend paintScaleLegend) {
057                Args.nullNotPermitted(stroke, "stroke");
058                this.stripOutlineStroke = stroke;
059                paintScaleLegend.notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(paintScaleLegend));
060        }
061
062        /**
063        * Sets the background paint and sends a  {@link TitleChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
064        * @param paint   the paint ( {@code  null}  permitted).
065        */
066        public void setBackgroundPaint(Paint paint, PaintScaleLegend paintScaleLegend) {
067                this.backgroundPaint = paint;
068                paintScaleLegend.notifyListeners(new TitleChangeEvent(paintScaleLegend));
069        }
070
071        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
072                return (PaintScaleLegendProduct2) super.clone();
073        }
074}
